sqlMap.select: select s.id id,s.description,s.create_time,photo.file_name img,u.nickname nickname from t_show s left join t_user u on s.user_id = u.user_id left join t_show_photo_rel rel on s.id = rel.show_id left join t_photo photo on rel.photo_id = photo.id where delete_status = 1 order by s.id
select * from t_show where delete_status = 0 and user_id=#user_id# ORDER BY id DESC
select file_name from t_photo where id=#show_id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_show(user_id,description,create_time,like_count,delete_status,width,height,show_type) values(#user_id#,#description#,#create_time#,#like_count#,#delete_status#,#width#,#height#,#show_type#) select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
sqlMap.update: update t_show SET delete_status=-1 WHERE id=#id#
